message.name: ERR_VIEW_SERVICEPLAN_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have appropriate privileges to view this approval request.

message.name: ERR_UPDATE_SERVICEPLAN_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have appropriate privileges to update this approval request.

message.name: ERR_SUBMIT_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have appropriate privileges to submit this service plan for approval.

message.name: ERR_APPROVE_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have appropriate privileges to approve this service plan.

message.name: ERR_REJECT_SECURITY_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have appropriate privileges to reject this service plan.

message.name: ERR_SUBMIT_STATUS_CODE_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: The service plan cannot be submitted for approval as it is not in an open or approved state.

message.name: ERR_NO_PLANNED_ITEM_EXISTS
message.locale: The service plan cannot be approved until a goal and at least one sub-goal and plan item have been defined.

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_PLAN_NOT_SUBMITTED
message.locale: The service plan cannot be approved as the service plan status is not submitted.

message.name: ERR_REJECT_SERVICE_PLAN_NOT_SUBMITTED
message.locale: The service plan cannot be rejected as the service plan status is not submitted.

message.name: INF_APPROVAL_APPROVESUBJECT
message.locale: This Service Plan has been approved.

message.name: INF_APPROVAL_APPROVEREASON
message.locale: This service plan has been approved on %1s. Please proceed to the case home page to review the details of this Service Plan.

message.name: INF_APPROVAL_REJECTSUBJECT
message.locale: This Service Plan has been rejected.

message.name: INF_APPROVAL_REJECTEASON
message.locale: This service plan has been rejected on %1s. Please proceed to the case home page to review the details of this Service Plan.

message.name: ERR_FV_REJECT_REASON_CODE_EMPTY
message.locale: Reject reason code must be specified.

message.name: INF_SERVICE_PLAN_SUBMITED_FOR_APPROVAL
message.locale: Service Plan has been submitted for approval.

message.name: ERR_APPROVAL_NOT_REJECTED
message.locale: This approval request may not be modified. Only rejected approval requests may be modified.
